network.events

Interface UpdateEvent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreateLocalPlayerEvent, CreatePlayerEvent, EndGameEvent, FreezePlayerEvent, InvalidPlayerEvent, ItemEvent, LocationEvent, MoveEvent, PickUpItemEvent, PlaceItemEvent, RemoveFromContainerEvent, RemoveFromInventoryEvent, RemoveItemEvent, RemovePlayerEvent, SendMapEvent, TurnEvent, UnfreezePlayerEvent, UnlockEvent, UpdateHealthEvent, UpdateProjectilePositionsEvent, UpdateScoreEvent, UpdateTimeEvent, ValidPlayerEvent

    public interface UpdateEvent
    An UpdateEvent is an event that can be queued to be sent to a player. UpdateEvents contain code for writing them to an OutputStream.
    Author:
    Bryden Frizzell

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void writeTo(java.io.OutputStream out)
      Writes this event to an OutputStream

        out - the OutputStream to be written to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
